ModMetaData.name: More Sleepy Genes
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
Another "I want more middle ground" gene mod that adds 4 low sleep and 4 high sleep need genes to the list.
These genes add a constant scale of rest fall rate factor changes. Low sleeps decrease the factor by 15% each time, meaning the lowest level is 85%, the next level is 70%, then 55%, and so on. The more sleepy genes add 20% to the factor each time, meaning it goes 120%, 140%, 160%, etc.
